title: 2014/354/Euratom: Council Decision of 12 June 2014 appointing a member of the Scientific and Technical Committee
header:
14.6.2014 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 175/31
COUNCIL DECISION
of 12 June 2014
appointing a member of the Scientific and Technical Committee
(2014/354/Euratom)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: Mr Roland ZEYEN is hereby appointed a member of the Scientific and Technical Committee until 24 July 2018.
This Decision shall enter into force on the day of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 12 June 2014.
For the Council
The President
Y. MANIATIS
(1)  Council Decision 2013/412/Euratom of 22 July 2013 renewing the membership of the Scientific and Technical Committee and repealing the Decision of 13 November 2012 appointing the members of the Scientific and Technical Committee (OJ L 205, 1.8.2013, p. 11).
